content.p: Describe the vector space involved in this problem, and an isomorphic Euclidean space and relevant Eucldean vectors that can be used to solve this problem.

outtro.p:
The given set of vectors is from the vector space of
2\times 2 matrices
degree-3 polynomials
quarternions
which is isomorphic to the Euclidean vector space \mathbb R^4. Thus the problem can be solved by showing how the Euclidean vector {{e_vector}} can be constructed as a linear combination from the set {{e_set}}.
